## Normalize type

Removes `null | undefined` from the return type if the operation is a subscription, since subs don't fire on empty/non-existent values.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Normalize<Shape extends CustomOperationParamShape, RT> = Shape['typeName'] extends 'Subscription' ? Exclude<RT, null | undefined> : RT;
```
**References:** [CustomOperationParamShape](./data-schema.customoperationparamshape.md)
